Posts.Content: Hi, my husband is having tests for prostate cancer, he gets his biopsy results back next monday... i have noticed he has lost quite a bit of weight from his face as his cheeks seem a bit sunken in.. is this normal for this type of cancer or has it got nothing to do with it? sorry for the daft question but i am really worried. annie
Posts.Title: weight loss in face

Posts.Content: Thank you all so much for your replies and good wishes!... just to give you a little bit of info about my husband, he is 53 and went the doctors as he was having to urinate alot... the doctor did a dre and said his prostate seemed enlarged.... he went the next day for blood and urine tests, his psa came back really high at 25!... so this was the reason for his biopsy, he has also had an abdominal scan which they said looked ok.... and an xray of where im not quite sure, but we will be getting all the results back next monday... thank you again for your best wishes... i just hope everything is ok. annie
Posts.Title: weight loss in face
